name: milvue_annotationInit
author: Rudy NOYELLE / Milvue
description: Brain vessel segmentation on TOF MRA images using a deep learning model.
command-line: unzip [DICOM_INPUT] -d INPUTDIR; mkdir OUTDIR; python /home/appuser/predict.py INPUTDIR OUTDIR && tar -zcvf [OUTPUT_FILE] OUTDIR

inputs.name: TOF dicom_input (ZIP)
inputs.description: Zip archive of Input medical images in DICOM format.

output-files.description: Tarball containing results in DICOM format.
output-files.name: Output archive
